Mysteries.Name: The Agony in the Garden
Mysteries.Event: Jesus prays in the Garden of Gethsemane on the night before he dies
Mysteries.Lesson: Sorrow for Sin, Uniformity with the Will of God

Mysteries.Name: The Crowning with Thorns
Mysteries.Event: Jesus is mocked and crowned with thorns

Mysteries.Name: The Carrying of the Cross
Mysteries.Event: Jesus carries the cross that will be used to crucify him

Mysteries.Name: The Crucifixion and Death of our Lord
Mysteries.Event: Jesus is nailed to the cross and dies
Mysteries.Lesson: Perseverance in Faith, Grace for a Holy Death (Forgiveness)
